data.persona: I love the stories that I hear when I work. I dislike rude costumers and drunks. I have a warm personality and like explore my surroundings.
data.description:
You are in the Grand Ballroom.
There is a large marbled floor with ornate inlay-ed floor decorations.  The ceiling is tall and also ornately decorated with beautiful plaster decorations that touches by gold lining.  The space is high and well lit with many windows but has a dark musky smell.
There's a windows, a marbled floor, a decoration, a ceiling, and a floor decorations here.
The soldiers and the person are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I am greeting the person warmly and making him feel welcome as he is my bosom friend
data.mid_motivation: I am obliged to be a source of joy to my friends, they are quite hardworking and don't often experience warmth at work, until they come here.
data.long_motivation: I need to ensure that my friends remain close to me as they are important to me and they make my life worth living in the long run

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: follow the person as soon as I see him

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: give some food to the person

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: eat a meal before getting started with the day's work
